scenario_text.value: I was out walking not far from my house.

Then suddenly I was surrounded by a strange
fog, and the next thing I knew I was lost.

Not just lost, I was somewhere I’d never seen
before. I kept walking until I saw this boy.

As for the purse, it was lying by the path.
I thought I’d return it if I found the owner.

As for this purse, it was lying by the path.
I was going to return it if I found the owner.

So then I found this rough customer on the
road. I called out to him, and here we are.
Hmm... Nothing about that sounds off to me.
Me either.

The fact that she even has Miu’s purse is
off!

Kaito, relax. Could you please stay quiet for
just a minute?

The one thing that does seem strange to me is
her ability to be safe without a monster.
Monster? What do you mean, “monster”?
Who’re you calling a monster?!
He’s talking about us!
Oh my...
Aaah! Wh-what could that be?

(Hm? That seemed more like an act than actual
surprise. But maybe I’m overthinking it.)
Ah...ah-ahhh...
Hm? What is it, Ryo?
Mommy...
Uh...excuse me?
Oh! Uh, she...reminds me of my mother.
She’s a good person... I’m sure of it.
Right...

I’m telling you the truth. Please, believe
me.
